member.name: MS_ADDINFO_FLAT
member.summary: The MS_ADDINFO_FLAT structure provides additional information about flat or end-to-end subject types.

member.name: MS_ADDINFO_FLAT.cbStruct
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: MS_ADDINFO_FLAT.pIndirectData
member.summary: A structure that contains the hash of a flat file subject.
